    • Predict GRN from scRNA+scATAC data (Chen 2018 dataset)

Fetch online genome annotations from Ensembldb database

get_genome_annotations.Rd

Fetch online genome annotations from Ensembldb database

Usage

get_genome_annotations(
  ensdb_annotations = EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86::EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86
)

Arguments

EnsDb_annotations

(EndsDb object) - Ensembldb database (default: EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86::EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86

Value

gene_range (GRanges object) - Genome annotations

Examples

gene_range = get_genome_annotations(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86::EnsDb.Hsapiens.v86)
#> Warning: The 2 combined objects have no sequence levels in common. (Use
